variants.Description in input context: I2020T mutation in the kinase domain

Material used.Description: Cells were treated with hydrogen peroxide to induce apoptosis, and proteolysis inhibitors were used to prevent degradation of I2020T mutant LRRK2.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T mutant LRRK2 showed reduced protective effect against hydrogen peroxide-induced apoptosis compared to wild-type LRRK2 when proteolysis was inhibited.
Wild-type LRRK2 provided normal protective effect against apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed (as implied by 'three independent experiments' in the text).

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: siRNA knockdown of LRRK2 was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test or ANOVA (implied by comparison of experimental groups).

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression or protective effect within 80-100% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression or protective effect below 50% of wild-type levels.
